bitfields.name: CFG_LC_STATE
bitfields.description: LC state configuration bit

bitfields.name: CFG_LVD_CORE_RESET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC CORE LVD analog detector are turned on, and CORE LVD reset are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_LVD_CORE_IRQ_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC CORE LVD analog detector are turned on, and CORE LVD IRQ are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_WDT0_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When WatchDog Timer 0 is activated, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_CWDT0_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When Code WatchDog Timer 0 is activated, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_ELS_GDET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When either GDET is enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_ANA_GDET_RESET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC analog glitch detect reset is enabled, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_ANA_GDET_IRQ_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC analog glitch detect IRQ is enabled, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_TAMPER_DET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When tamper detector is enabled in TDET, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_LVD_VSYS_RESET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC VSYS LVD analog detector are turned on and VSYS LVD reset are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_LVD_VDDIO_RESET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC VDDIO LVD analog detector are turned on and VDDIO LVD reset are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_LVD_VSYS_IRQ_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC VSYS LVD analog detector are turned on and VSYS LVD irq are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_LVD_VDDIO_IRQ_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC VDDIO LVD analog detector are turned on and VDDIO LVD irq are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_WDT1_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When WatchDog Timer 1 is activated, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_CWDT1_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When Code WatchDog Timer 1 is activated, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_TEMPTAMPER_DET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When temperature tamper detector is enabled in VBAT, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_VOLTAMPER_DET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When voltage tamper detector is enabled in VBAT, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_LHTTAMPER_DET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When light tamper detector is enabled in VBAT, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_CLKTAMPER_DET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When clk tamper detector is enabled in VBAT, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_QK_DISABLE_ENROLL
bitfields.description: When QK PUF "qk_disable_enroll" input is driven 1, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_QK_DISABLE_WRAP
bitfields.description: When QK PUF "qk_disable_wrap" input is driven 1, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_DIS_STRICT_MODE
bitfields.description: When CFG_SEC_ENA_SEC_CHK indicates state 0 or when DISABLE_STRICT_MODE bits in MISC_CTRL_REG and MISC_CTRL_DP_REG on the AHB secure controller are equal to 01, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_DIS_VIOL_ABORT
bitfields.description: When the DISABLE_VIOLATION_ABORT bits in MISC_CTRL_REG and MISC_CTRL_DP_REG on the AHB secure controller are not equal to 10, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_ENA_NS_PRIV_CHK
bitfields.description: When the ENABLE_NS_PRIV_CHECK bits in MISC_CTRL_REG and MISC_CTRL_DP_REG on the AHB secure controller are not equal to 10, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_ENA_S_PRIV_CHK
bitfields.description: When the ENABLE_S_PRIV_CHECK bits in MISC_CTRL_REG and MISC_CTRL_DP_REG on the AHB secure controller are not equal to 10, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_ENA_SEC_CHK
bitfields.description: When the ENABLE_SECURE_CHECKING bits in MISC_CTRL_REG and MISC_CTRL_DP_REG on the AHB secure controller are not equal to 10, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_IDAU_ALLNS
bitfields.description: When the IDAU_ALL_NS bits in MISC_CTRL_REG and MISC_CTRL_DP_REG on the AHB secure controller are equal to 01, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_LOCK_NS_MPU
bitfields.description: When the LOCK_NS_MPU bits in CPU0_LOCK_REG on the AHB secure controller are not equal to 10, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_LOCK_NS_VTOR
bitfields.description: When the LOCK_NS_VTOR bits in CPU0_LOCK_REG on the AHB secure controller are not equal to 10, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_LOCK_S_MPU
bitfields.description: When the LOCK_S_MPU bits in CPU0_LOCK_REG on the AHB secure controller are not equal to 10, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_LOCK_S_VTAIRCR
bitfields.description: When the LOCK_S_VTAIRCR bits in CPU0_LOCK_REG on the AHB secure controller are not equal to 10, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: CFG_SEC_LOCK_SAU
bitfields.description: When the LOCK_SAU bits in CPU0_LOCK_REG on the AHB secure controller are not equal to 10, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: METAL_VERSION
bitfields.description: metal version

bitfields.name: ROM_PATCH_VERSION
bitfields.description: ROM patch version

bitfields.name: CFG_HVD_CORE_RESET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC CORE HVD analog detector are turned on, and CORE HVD reset are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_HVD_CORE_IRQ_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC CORE HVD analog detector are turned on, and CORE HVD IRQ are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_HVD_VSYS_RESET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC VSYS HVD analog detector are turned on and VSYS HVD reset are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_HVD_VDDIO_RESET_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC VDDIO HVD analog detector are turned on and VDDIO HVD reset are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_HVD_VSYS_IRQ_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC VSYS HVD analog detector are turned on and VSYS HVD irq are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: CFG_HVD_VDDIO_IRQ_ENABLED
bitfields.description: When SPC VDDIO HVD analog detector are turned on and VDDIO HVD irq are enabled, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: ST_TEMPORAL_STATE
bitfields.description: TEMPORAL_STATE[3:0] in the ELS_TEMPORAL_STATE register reflects this register

bitfields.name: ST_CPU0_DBGEN
bitfields.description: When CPU0 (CM33) "dbgen" input is state 1, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_CPU0_NIDEN
bitfields.description: When CPU0 (CM33) "niden" input is state 1, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_CPU0_SPIDEN
bitfields.description: When CPU0 (CM33) "spiden" input is state 1, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_CPU0_SPNIDEN
bitfields.description: When CPU0 (CM33) "spniden" input is state 1, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_CPU1_DBGEN
bitfields.description: When CPU1 (CM33) "dbgen" input is state 1, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: ST_CPU1_NIDEN
bitfields.description: When CPU1 (CM33) "niden" input is state 1, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: ST_DAP_ENABLE_CPU0
bitfields.description: When DAP to AP0 for CPU0 (CM33) debug access is allowed, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_DAP_ENABLE_CPU1
bitfields.description: When DAP to AP1 for CPU1 (CM33) debug access is allowed, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: ST_DAP_ENABLE_DSP
bitfields.description: When DAP to AP3 for DSP (CoolFlux) debug access is allowed, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_ALLOW_TEST_ACCESS
bitfields.description: When JTAG TAP access is allowed, this bit indicates state 1.

bitfields.name: ST_XO32K_FAILED
bitfields.description: When XO32K oscillation fail flag is state 1, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_XO40M_FAILED
bitfields.description: When XO40M oscillation fail flag is state 1, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_IFR_LOAD_FAILED
bitfields.description: When IFR load fail flag is state 1, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_GLITCH_DETECT_FLAG
bitfields.description: GLITCH_DETECT_FLAG is state of 4-bit Glitch Ripple Counter output.

bitfields.name: ST_QK_PUF_SCORE
bitfields.description: These register bits indicate the state of "qk_puf_score[3:0]" outputs from QK PUF block

bitfields.name: ST_QK_ZEROIZED
bitfields.description: This register bit indicates the state of "qk_zeroized" output from QK PUF block

bitfields.name: ST_MAIN_CLK_IS_EXT
bitfields.description: When MAIN_CLK is running from external clock source either XO32M, XO32K or GPIO CLKIN, this bit indicates state 1

bitfields.name: ST_DCDC_VOUT
bitfields.description: VOUT[1:0] setting on DCDC0 register in SPC block will reflect to this register. Default is 1.0V

bitfields.name: ST_DCDC_DS
bitfields.description: DCDC drive strength setting. Default is normal drive.

bitfields.name: ST_BOOT_MODE
bitfields.description: ISP pin status during boot. By default ISP pin is pulled up. If want to enter ISP mode during boot, ISP pin should be pull down when out of reset.

bitfields.name: ST_BOOT_RETRY_CNT
bitfields.description: BOOT_RETRY_CNT[3:0] in the ELS_BOOT_RETRY_CNT register reflects this register

bitfields.name: ST_LDO_CORE_VOUT
bitfields.description: VOUT[1:0] setting on LDO Core register in SPC block will reflect to this register. Default is 1.0V

bitfields.name: ST_LDO_CORE_DS
bitfields.description: LDO_CORE drive strength setting. Default is normal drive.

bitfields.name: FLAG_AP_ENABLE_CPU0
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when DAP enables AP0 for CPU0 (CM33) debug access. The register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_AP_ENABLE_CPU1
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when DAP enables AP1 for CPU1 (CM33) debug access. The register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_AP_ENABLE_DSP
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when DAP enables AP3 for DSP (CoolFlux) debug access. The register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: EFUSE_ATTACK_DETECT
bitfields.description: OTPC can output attack_detect signal when it detects attack when load shadow registers. The output will be cleared by reset. ELS_AS_FLAG is reset by PoR, so the status can be recorded.

bitfields.name: FLAG_LVD_CORE_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag register is set 1 when VDD_CORE LVD event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_WDT0_RESET_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when WatchDog Timer 0 reset is enabled and reset event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by AO domain POR.

bitfields.name: FLAG_CWDT0_RESET_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when Code WatchDog Timer 0 reset is enabled and reset event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by AO domain POR.

bitfields.name: FLAG_WDT0_IRQ_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when WatchDog Timer 0 IRQ is enabled and IRQ event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_CWDT0_IRQ_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when Code WatchDog Timer 0 IRQ is enabled and IRQ event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_QK_ERROR
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when QK_ERROR is flagged from QK PUF block. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_ELS_GLITCH_DETECTED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when GDET error is flagged. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_ANA_GLITCH_DETECTED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when ANALOG GDET error is flagged in SYSCON block. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_TAMPER_EVENT_DETECTED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when tamper event is flagged from TDET. This register is cleared 0 by AO domain POR or by PMC reset event, if tamper detection event is cleared by software.

bitfields.name: FLAG_FLASH_ECC_INVALID
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when FLASH controller indicates ECC error. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_SEC_VIOL_IRQ_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when security violation is indicated from FLASH sub-system or AHB bus matrix.

bitfields.name: FLAG_CPU0_NS_C_ACC_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when CPU0 (CM33) makes non-secure code transactions. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_CPU0_NS_D_ACC_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when CPU0 (CM33) makes non-secure data transactions. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_LVD_VSYS_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag register is set 1 when VDD_SYS LVD event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_LVD_VDDIO_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag register is set 1 when VDD LVD event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_WDT1_RESET_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when WatchDog Timer 1 reset is enabled and reset event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by AO domain POR.

bitfields.name: FLAG_CWDT1_RESET_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when Code WatchDog Timer 1 reset is enabled and reset event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by AO domain POR.

bitfields.name: FLAG_WDT1_IRQ_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when WatchDog Timer 1 IRQ is enabled and IRQ event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_CWDT1_IRQ_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when Code WatchDog Timer 1 IRQ is enabled and IRQ event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_TEMPTAMPER_DET_IRQ_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when temperature temper IRQ is enabled and IRQ event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_VOLTAMPER_DET_IRQ_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when voltage temper IRQ is enabled and IRQ event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_LHTTAMPER_DET_IRQ_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when light temper IRQ is enabled and IRQ event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.

bitfields.name: FLAG_CLKTAMPER_DET_IRQ_OCCURRED
bitfields.description: This flag bit is set as 1 when clock temper IRQ is enabled and IRQ event is triggered. This register is cleared 0 by PMC reset event.
